DEC:				HEX:			ACTUAL REPRESENTATION
2147483648			0x8000 0000			
-2147483648			0x8000 0000			

2147483647			0x7FFF FFFF			
-2147483647			0x8000 0001

4294901760			0xFFFF 0000

-32768				0x8000

32767				0x7FFF
